content: Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings after removing TypedContext
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings after removing into_typed
Remove into_tool_handler() method and update any imports
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings after removing into_tool_handler
Remove ToolHandler enum from types.rs (keep the trait and structs)
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings after removing ToolHandler enum
Update handler_context.rs to handle the removal of HandlerType::BrpExecute variant
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings after updating handler_context
fix any clippy issues following rules: do not mark dead code, do not prefix unused with _, remove if not used
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
The subagent should STOP work here and return control to you

Task a new subagent to do a code review of the changes - focus on identifying duplication and complexity, and validating that the implementation plan was actually implemented. Emphasize that it should only read and analyze, not modify anything.
When the review subagent returns, STOP and review the suggested changes with the user
